tradeModePopup.title: Position Mode
tradeModePopup.titleHint: Adjustment to the position mode is only effective for the current trading order.
tradeModePopup.subTitle: What are the cross margin mode and isolated margin mode?
tradeModePopup.contentDescription1: Under cross margin mode, all the available balance in your account can be used as collateral to meet the maintenance margin required to avoid forced liquidation. If positions are liquidated, all the corresponding available balances may be lost.
tradeModePopup.contentDescription2: Under isolated margin mode, a certain amount of margin is allocated to the position, and the margin can be adjusted manually. Open positions will be liquidated if the position margin is below the maintenance margin level. In the case of forced liquidation, you may lose the initial margin and the additional margin added to this position.

futuresDetail.fullWarehouseTipContent:
This is a cross leverage transaction, and the loss amount can exceed the margin amount. 

When continuous losses cause the account to reach the liquidation line, other orders will be liquidated one after another, and all the account funds will be lost! 

It is recommended that you set take profit and stop loss prices to control the funds more efficiently!

noWithdrawCategory.title: Withdrawal channel is closed. Please try later.
noWithdrawCategory.content:
The possible reasons are as follows: 
1. Funds cannot be withdrawn through the withdrawal channel again due to the daily withdrawal amount reaching the upper limit. 
2. System is under maintenance.

The account number specified by the customer for withdrawal must be the account number of the withdrawal bank specified at the time of account opening.

paymentBank.confirmPaymentButton: Deposit now to enjoy the trading.
paymentBank.remindTip:
Please transfer funds through your own account. 
The account is valid for 24 hours. 
The transfer amount must be consistent. 
Please do not make duplicate transfers.
paymentBank.toTransferButton: Get transfer information to transfer funds.
paymentBank.learnInfoReady: I already understand the above information.
paymentBank.transferDescriptionTip:
Note: 
The transfer cannot be successful if the transfer amount is inconsistent with the amount in the application. 
The transfer cannot be successful if the order expires. 
Please do not make duplicate remittances.
paymentBank.paymentValueTip1: Friendly Reminder: In case of deposit problems, please contact
paymentBank.paymentValueTip3:
The customer support agents will help you deposit funds quickly. 
Service tenet: we sincerely “serve you with all our hearts” with our motto “client first.”

accountBlockPopup.title: The account is locked. You are unable to log in.
accountBlockPopup.content:
The possible reasons are as follows:
   1. Abnormal trading behavior 
   2. Multi-account registration with the same IP
   3. Abnormal deposit and withdrawal behavior
